parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Valve Cover Gasket and O-Ring Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the valve cover gasket and O-ring can cause oil leaks, which can lead to serious injuries or death due to loss of control of the motorcycle. Additionally, the engine can seize due to lack of oil, resulting in costly repairs.
symptoms: Oil leaks from the front top of the engine
ticking or tapping noise from the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cams and tappets can cause the engine to seize, leading to serious injuries or death due to loss of control of the motorcycle. Additionally, the engine can suffer from costly damage.
symptoms: Ticking or tapping noise from the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The valve cover oil leak can cause oil to leak onto the engine and surrounding components, potentially leading to premature wear, engine damage, and increased risk of engine failure.
symptoms: Oil leak from the valve cover
oil droplets or stains under the vehicle

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The valve welding to the piston can cause the engine to seize or fail, leading to a loss of power, stalling, and potentially leaving the driver stranded.
